example.parse: (S (CONJ و) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS كان) (PP-PRD (PREP في) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN وسع) (NP (NOUN_PROP ترومان)))) (NP-ADV (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_ACC فعلا)) (SBAR-SBJ (SUB_CONJ ان) (S (VP (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:S يهمس) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (PP-CLR (PREP ب) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_GEN كلمة) (ADJ اخرى))) (PP (PREP في) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN اذن) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الرئيس) (DET+ADJ+CASE_DEF_GEN الاميركي))))

arg.g: in the ear of the American president
